pnp:Provisioning.Author: John White
pnp:Provisioning.Description: Leadership Site for the latest news from senior leadership.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Assets
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use this library to store files which are included on pages within this site, such as images on Wiki pages.

View.Name: {316D5E7F-55EC-4BA5-BBA9-15C85E7305ED}

pnp:DataRow.pnp:DataValue: Lynne Robbins is the CEO of Contoso since 1994.
Emily Braun has been working at Contoso since 1998, of which the last 2 years she acted as CFO.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
The world changes when we change our perspective.
- Patti Fernandez

Monthly Q&As

Each month all employees are invited to join us for the Contoso Electronics Monthly Q&A. Patti will share updates with the executive leadership team and invite special guest to share progress and updates on our latest and greatest products.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: This month there were great strides made in the development and growth of our new office in Singapore. We are 3 months away from moving the team into the new location and will have an update on the building and process soon.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Contoso Eagle launch and the future - July 2018

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: This year at Drone MAX Paris I had the opportunity to give the keynote address on advancements in drone technology for the professional and consumer market with a hint to what the future of our industry holds.
